page.title: 15A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: My name is{Claire.}On Saturdays I get up at about 8.45 and put on my riding kit.I ride with Natalie, Helen and Ruth. Our riding instructor is Carol Harvey. I ride an 11 year old scew- bald. He gallops fast, becomes excited and is hard to stop. We ride thro' the plains, over the cross country course,thro' the woods and up the hill at full gallop. Coming back are more jumps and up hill gallops. After lunch (soup), I muck out our rabbits and feed them dandelions,grass and vetches.Both Tiddles and Moonlight Wally are silvery black and male. Tiddles is adult and Wally is a baby. Our evening meal is a roast and vegetables but no pudding.Afterwards I help Mum wash up and watch television. I go to bed at about 9.30 and read until about 10.30.
